metadata.title: CVE-2024-28582 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in open source FreeImage v.3.19.0 [r1909]allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code via thergbe_RGBEToFloat() function when reading images in HDR format.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2025-01-16').
